name: Uprise (AEZ NETWORK)
description:
Welcome to Uprise

Arcade game inspired by DUET. Rise to the challenge between CHAOS & BALANCE. 

There are two chapters for now. Story & Madness. Maybe we will add more if we get your appreciation. Learn & increase your focus, memory & skill to balance in chaos. Be the smartest of your friends in passing levels and increasing difficulty.

GAME FEATURES:

Uprise is 100% Free - This fantastic game has aesthetic designs and graphics - Relaxing music plays in the background - Android and PC support - play everywhere - Suitable for all ages.

Contact Us

Gmail: aeznetwork@gmail.com

Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/aeznetwork

We are Aez-Network & we’d love to hear from you! And follow us on social media. Thank you so much for your time.
